contest-event.event-date:
March 24, 2013 D Espresso Contest
Espresso Contest 0 Set Test and Own Choice
espresso-contest
None
Legenda Rumantscha
Worbighalle, Flaach, ZH, Switzerland http://www.bbflaach.ch/cms/index.php/news-berichte/brass-band-wettbewerb-flaach
Bands from all gradings were judged together, but played partially in order of grading - the four Third Section bands (ZO, Koblenz, Marthalen, La Tanne) played first, followed by the lunch break. Then, the two Second Section and two First Section bands (2nd: Junior Valaisan, Sulgen; 1st: Breitenbach, Wil) played.
Each band played a 30 minute programme consisting of three pieces - own-choice test-piece, hymn, and set test-piece. The set test-piece varied according to the section of the band; 'Legenda Rumantscha' was set for the 1st Section bands, 'Fantasia sur Conta Tudi' for the 2nd Section bands, and 'Porta Alpina' for the 3rd Section bands.
Jan. 14, 2014, 8:35 a.m. Jan. 14, 2014, 10:24 a.m.
1 Brass Band Breitenbach Enrico Calzaferri Firestorm
2 MG Koblenz Guido Staudacher Jubilation! [Curnow]
3 Universal Brass Band Wil Sabine Egli Brass Metamorphosis
4 Brass Band Junior Valaisan Julien Roh Sinfonietta No. 1 [de Meij]
